verses.name: Ezekiel 22:4
verses.text: Thou art become guilty in thy blood that thou hast shed; and hast defiled thyself in thine idols which thou hast made; and thou hast caused thy days to draw near, and art come even unto thy years: therefore have I made thee a reproach unto the heathen, and a mocking to all countries.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:5
verses.text: Those that be near, and those that be far from thee, shall mock thee, which art infamous and much vexed.

verses.name: Ezekiel 22:6
verses.text: Behold, the princes of Israel, every one were in thee to their power to shed blood.
